$comment: Schema version 1.0 - User prompt execution modes configuration
title: Blueprint Prompts Configuration
description: Schema for configuring user-prompt node execution modes. Can be used standalone (plugin-level prompts.yaml) or embedded in workflow.yaml initial_state.prompts.

promptsConfig.description: Prompts configuration for user_prompt node execution

tabularConfig.description: Configuration for tabular mode user prompts

match_strategy.description: How to match user text input to option IDs

other_handler.description: What to do when user input doesn't match any option ID

fuzzy_threshold.description: Similarity threshold for fuzzy matching (0.0-1.0). Only used when match_strategy is 'fuzzy'.

case_sensitive.description: Whether matching is case-sensitive. Defaults to false (case-insensitive).

show_option_ids.description: Whether to show the Option ID column in the table. Defaults to true.

instruction_text.description: Custom instruction text shown below the table. Use {default} to include default text.
instruction_text.default: **Please type the Option ID of your choice.**

tabular.instruction_text: **Enter your choice exactly as shown in the Option ID column.**
